text: aur (he nabee! yaad karo) jab aapake paalanahaar ne farishton se kaha ki main dharatee mein ek khaleefa[1] banaane ja raha hoon. ve boleh kya too usamen use banaayeg, jo usamen upadrav karega tatha rakt bahaayega? jabaki ham teree prashansa ke saath tere gun aur pavitrata ka gaan karate hain! (allaah) ne kahaah jo main jaanata hoon, vah tum nahin jaanate
